activities:
FSD provides services to our customers by developing and administering employee and customer survey processes and by processing survey data. All participation by end users within a given client is voluntary. 
FSD reports results back to the client in the aggregate using agreed upon cutoffs for number of responses to assure anonymity. 
Client organizations typically provide us with names and email addresses of participants to the surveys. Participation is voluntary.
eucountries: Ireland, Austria, Italy, Belgium, Luxembourg, Denmark, Netherlands, Finland, Portugal, France, Spain, Germany, Sweden, Greece, United Kingdom
personaldata: On-Line, Off-Line, Manually Processed, Human Resources
recoursemech: FSD will cooperate with the EU data protection authorities in the investigation and resolution of complaints by data subjects and comply with advice given by EU Data Protection Authorities, and provide written comfirmation to that effect.
